snippet: Sprint Nextel sells $6.5 billion of high-yield bonds. | The Verizon Wireless deal highlights what bankers describe as the continued health of the debt markets. | Mail.ru sells its remaining stake in Facebook for around $525 million. | Charles Schwab...
abstract: Sprint Nextel sells $6.5 billion of high-yield bonds. | The Verizon Wireless deal highlights what bankers describe as the continued health of the debt markets. | Mail.ru sells its remaining stake in Facebook for around $525 million. | Charles Schwab & Company is seeking to eliminate the option of class-action lawsuits for its clients.
